subject: Football
lead_paragraph: This week’s games feature a trip to Lambeau Field for the Philadelphia Eagles, who are playing behind a resurgent Mark Sanchez, and will face a Green Bay Packers team that is 41-10 when Aaron Rodgers starts on their home field.
snippet: This week’s games feature a trip to Lambeau Field for the Philadelphia Eagles, who are playing behind a resurgent Mark Sanchez, and will face a Green Bay Packers team that is 41-10 when Aaron Rodgers starts on their home field.
